name: bento4
description: Full-featured MP4 format and MPEG DASH library and tools

scripts.build: rm -rf builds && mkdir builds && cd builds && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - mp4dump.js > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out mp4dump.js && chmod +x mp4dump.js && echo 'done'

author: https://github.com/axiomatic-systems/Bento4/graphs/contributors
